title.label: Title
title.info: Add "//" to insert a line break.

style_mobile.label: Mobile style
style_mobile.info: Controls how the title text is styled on smaller screens; choose "None" to follow the text style of the section it's in.

style_tablet.label: Tablet style
style_tablet.info: Controls how the title text is styled on tablet screens; choose "None" to follow the mobile style.

style_desktop.label: Desktop style
style_desktop.info: Controls how the title text is styled on larger screens; choose "None" to follow the tablet style.

text_align.label: Text alignment
text_align.info: Controls text alignment on larger screens; if left as "None", it will follow the mobile alignment setting, or the text alignment of the section it's in

text_align_mobile.label: Text alignment (mobile)
text_align_mobile.info: Controls how the title text is aligned on smaller screens; choose "None" to follow the text alignment of the section it's in.

decoration.label: Decoration
decoration.info: Choose a decoration to add to the title.

decoration_color.label: Decoration color
decoration_color.info: Choose a color for the decoration (default: pink, #f57eb6). Only applies if a decoration is selected.
